lemma tauLaw4CongSimRight: fixes \<Psi> :: 'b and P :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi" and Q :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi" and \<alpha> :: "'a prefix" assumes C1: "\<And>\<Psi> P Q. \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<sim> Q \<Longrightarrow> (\<Psi>, P, Q) \<in> Rel" shows "\<Psi> \<rhd> \<alpha>\<cdot>(\<tau>.(P) \<oplus> Q) \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>Rel\<guillemotright> \<alpha>\<cdot>P \<oplus> \<alpha>\<cdot>(\<tau>.(P) \<oplus> Q)"
